With CEHRT, the provider must submit to the Secretary of Health & Human Services (HHS) information on the quality of care and other measures. The concept of meaningful use rested on the five pillars of health outcomes policy priorities, supported the aims and priorities of the National Quality Strategy.  Encouraged the use of CEHRT for \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"continuous quality improvement \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"at the point of care and the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"exchange of information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in the most structured format possible.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Stage 3: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In October 2015, CMS released a final rule that established Stage 3 deadlines to 2017 and beyond, using \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CEHRT\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to improve health outcomes. In addition, this rule modified Stage 2 to ease reporting requirements and align with other CMS programs.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
